definition.text: I know I'm ready to customize some charts. Are you? Let's walk through how to add the foundational nodes we need to start our chart.

paragraphs.text: The first thing we need to do is add a fresh dashboard.
Hover over the Project Dashboards node and click Add Dashboard.

Make sure to name your new Dashboard with something you will recognize. A good naming practice is to reference the type of environment (live trading, backtesting, etc.) and something distinctive about the charts you plan on adding. For us that would be:
